DOC.brief_summary: Study on the relationship between the response of the airways to a bronchial provocation test with mannitol and the degree of airway inflammation in asthma patients.
DOC.brief_title: Bronchial Response to Mannitol and Inflammation in Steroid Naive Asthmatics.
DOC.detailed_description: Study on the relationship between the response of the airways to a bronchial provocation test with mannitol and the degree of airway inflammation in asthma patients.
